parameters: \N<Yuia>I'm home, Segi.
\N<Segi>Welcome back, Lord Yuia.
\N<Yuia>Ah, how's Riia doing?

\N<Segi>Yes, he's sleeping in the back. It seems he's a bit tired
after all.

\N<Yuia>...I see. We've been causing Riia nothing but trouble
because of our circumstances.
\N<Segi>...How did it go?

\N<Yuia>Ah, I looked around the area, but it seems there are no
problems. The town isn't big, but it's close by.

\N<Segi>That's good. Then it looks like we can settle down here for
a while.

\N<Yuia>That's the plan, though I wish we could live in peace here
forever.

\N<Segi>Hehe, we can't ask for too much. After all, to Luda we must
be wanted fugitives.

\N<Yuia>Speaking of which... today in town, a beautiful woman
approached me. She asked if I wanted to go out for a meal
with her.

\N<Segi>Oh my... that's not very calm of you. So? Did you excitedly
accept her invitation?

\N<Yuia>Of course not... but since that moment, I've wanted to do
this.

\N<Segi>Oh... no, just because a lovely woman approached you doesn't
mean you should...

\N<Yuia>You don't like it? I've been desperate to hold back my
feelings since then.

\N<Segi>Hehe... how lewd. But I might feel the same way. Here, I can
monopolize Lord Yuia without anyone else's concern.
\N<Segi>It's good that... Riia is sleeping quietly tonight.
\N<Segi>...
\N<Yuia>Segi... what's wrong?

\N<Segi>Lord Yuia... that... you're still worried about it, aren't
you...?

\N<Yuia>...Are you talking about the pattern on your body? If so,
there's no need to worry about that.
\N<Yuia>I'm fine with it... no matter what happens, you are you.

\N<Segi>Thank you very much... Indeed, I was anxious about revealing
myself. Anxious, but... I believed that you would say so.

\N<Segi>Still... even though I believed, I was anxious. It's been
repeating up until now...

\N<Yuia>...I see. The anxiety you feel is due to my shortcomings.
It's certainly not your fault.

\N<Yuia>If you're anxious... then let me make you believe right now.
So much so that you'll never doubt again.
\N<Segi>Lord Yuia... I will always adore you...

\N<Yuia>Me too, Segi. That's why even if you were to change in ways
I don't know about, I can swear in my heart that I love you.
\N<Yuia>Is this... not enough? Can I still not dispel your anxiety?
\N<Segi>No... I feel very encouraged now... so it's okay...
\N<Yuia>Segi...
\N<Segi>My body... how is it?

\N<Yuia>It's wonderful. Of course it is. To me, it's just as
attractive as it ever was.

\N<Yuia>However, of course... if I said that the pattern doesn't
catch my eye, that would be a lie.
\N<Segi>As expected... that's true.

\N<Yuia>Don't misunderstand me, just because it catches my eye
doesn't mean it's a reason to deny you.
\N<Yuia>It means... I can accept everything about you.
\N<Segi>Everything about me...?
\N<Yuia>Yes. To me, walking together with someone means just that.

\N<Yuia>No matter what gets added on top of what one might call the
foundation of a person as they live their life... it doesn't
defile or destroy that foundation itself.

\N<Yuia>To the very end, that person remains unchanged, continuing
to exist before me as my precious one.
\N<Segi>I'm happy... I... I...
\N<Yuia>Segi...

\N<Segi>Please... yours, Yuia-sama. Look, it's already... like
this...

\N<Segi>I will believe those words... If I do, then I no longer need
to feel ashamed of this body, right...?
\N<Yuia>...Yes.
line

\N<Segi>Haa... Haa...
\N<Segi>...Wh-What's wrong with my body...

\N<Segi>It can't be... That shouldn't be possible. Yuia-sama did so
much to me during the day...
\N<Segi>...
\N<Segi>Could it be...?

\N<Yuia>I was told something like this by Riia during the day.
セギ_疑問
\N<Segi>Is that so... That child, huh.

\N<Segi>It's probably about Rame-chan. The two of them have had a
really tough time with this incident...
\N<Yuia>I see... So that's it.

\N<Yuia>But far from despairing, that child is trying to stand
firmly on their own feet.

\N<Yuia>Surely, before long... In the not too distant future,
they'll become a warrior far stronger than I could ever be.
It's complicated as a father, though.
セギ_笑い
\N<Segi>Hehe... When that time comes, I'll be there to comfort you.

\N<Yuia>Is that so, then I'm relieved. With that in mind, I'll train
Riia with peace of mind.
